title: TriggerTypeEnum
description: The enumerated values to specify whether an option will trigger or expire depending upon whether the spot rate is above or below the barrier rate.

oneOf.title: Equal
oneOf.description: The underlier price must be equal to the Trigger level.

oneOf.title: EqualOrGreater
oneOf.description: The underlier price must be equal to or greater than the Trigger level.

oneOf.title: EqualOrLess
oneOf.description: The underlier price must be equal to or less than the Trigger level.

oneOf.title: Greater
oneOf.description: The underlier price must be greater than the Trigger level.

oneOf.title: Less
oneOf.description: The underlier price must be less than the Trigger level.
